EnhancedContent:
H , This is regarding Azure load testing pricing. Please advice.

| Virtual User Hour (VUH) usage | 0 - 10,000 Virtual User Hours - $0.15/VUH10,000+ Virtual User Hours - $0.06/VUH | | --- | --- | | Virtual User Hour (VUH) usage | 0 - 10,000 Virtual User Hours - **$0.15**/VUH10,000+ Virtual User Hours - **$0.06**/VUH |

I am trying to understand above pricing. Lets say i want to run a test with 10k users just to login my website. This will max take 10 sec to complete. How will the pricing gets calculated?

Regards,

Sharukh
Author: sharukh

Title: Azure Load Test Pricing
